uk.co.unitycoders.pircbotx.commandprocessor

Class BasicMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.unitycoders.pircbotx.commandprocessor.BasicMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Message
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelMessage, UserMessage

    public abstract class BasicMessage
extends Object
implements Message
    Abstract message adapter for uc_pircbotx. An abstract version of the Bot Message interface which deals with some of the common features which we can deal with for the child classes.
